channel.title: Lag Issues
channel.description:
Well I'm running a matrix source and everything loads fine and whatnot in the files but I seem to be having problems loading simple things when I walk around in the server like movement and camera rotations, it just freezes and I have to move the client around or minimize it.
This is what the source's cmd is telling me :
[code=java][Launcher] Initing Cache... [Launcher] Initing Data Files... [Launcher] Initing WorldList... [ShopsHandler] Packing shops... [Launcher] Initing Fishing Spots... [Launcher] Initing NPC Combat Scripts... [Launcher] Initing Dialogues... [Launcher] Initing Controlers... [Launcher] Initing Cutscenes... [Launcher] Initing Friend Chats Manager... [Launcher] Initing Cores Manager... [Launcher] Initing World... [Launcher] Initing Region Builder... [Launcher] Server took 22676 milli seconds to launch. 01/25/13 19:33:40 IP Log Error. [WorldPacketsDecoder] Missing packet 16, expected size: 2, actual size: 2[/code]

item.title: Lag Issues
item.dc:creator: @mike4ever mike4ever
item.description:
@mike4ever wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:2, topic:479647”]Im not to sure but looks @ this:

IP Log Error.
[WorldPacketsDecoder] Missing packet 16, expected size: 2, actual size: 2

ur missing a packet and ip log error. Not to sure but might be sumthing[/quote]

I’m aware I’m trying to figure out how to fix it , Thanks though.

Read full topic
